infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos of washed vehicles.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to select vehicle wash photos.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access for route optimization and delivery efficiency.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app needs continuous location access for fleet coordination and route optimization.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Background location access enables continuous route optimization and improves delivery efficiency.

plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Background location access enables continuous route optimization and improves delivery efficiency.
